name: jste
description: Simple HTML editor for modern browsers without frameworks and other dependecies.

scripts.build: cd assets/js && uglifyjs polyfills.js jste.js -c -m -o jste.all.min.js --source-map url=jste.all.min.js.map && cd ../css && uglifycss jste.css > jste.min.css
scripts.dev: cd assets/js && uglifyjs polyfills.js jste.js -b -o jste.all.js --source-map url=jste.all.js.map

author: Petr Kovalenko
